forager.domain

Class Dungeon

  • java.lang.Object
    • forager.domain.Dungeon

  • public class Dungeon
extends java.lang.Object
    Dungeon is used to store the map and to generate node information.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Dungeon(char[][] map)
      Creates a new dungeon from a 2D char array.
      Dungeon(java.lang.String[] stringMap)
      Creates a new dungeon from a string array.

    • Method Summary

      Generates tile information for given coordinates.

      Creates a list of tiles in the map.

      Finds first instance of a given character in the map.
      MyArrayList<Tile> getAdjacentTiles(int x, int y)
      Returns a list of non-wall tiles adjacent to a tile at given coordinates.
      char getChar(int x, int y)
      Returns the character at given coordinates
      MyArrayList<Tile> getSpecialTiles()
      Returns an ordered list of special tiles on the map.

      Returns tile at given coordinates.

      Checks if coordinates are within bounds.

      • findTileWithChar

        public Tile findTileWithChar(char character)
        Finds first instance of a given character in the map. Mainly used to locate the starting and ending tiles.
        Parameters:
        character - character to be searched
        Returns:
        tile with given character
